data.text: @WiscoInferno I may be in the minority, where I don’t care.  It makes minimal difference in getting excited or upset over something arbitrary and meaningless.  Also, not saying you do that.  Just a lot of #Badgers Twitter does.
@WiscoInferno It’s also the one attribute of Bielema’s that I wish Chryst had. The ability to step on an opponent’s throat and make a point when necessary does go a long way.

@WiscoInferno You make some very valid points. My take on the polls is the the #4 ranking was a bit high to start a season, but it also gives the team a great jumping off point instead of starting from the 10-15 spot and needing more help to get in consideration for the playoff.
